DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate efficacy safety desloratadine ( MK-4117 ) Japanese participant chronic urticaria . The primary hypothesis efficacy desloratadine 10 mg 5 mg superior placebo base change Baseline sum score pruritus/itch rash assess Investigator Week 2 .
DOC.brief_title: An Efficacy Safety Study Desloratadine ( MK-4117 ) Japanese Participants With Chronic Urticaria ( MK-4117-201 )
DOC.criteria: Chronic urticaria [ rash ( erythema , wheal ) 1 month without know cause ] Outpatient Stimulationinduced urticaria [ physical urticaria ( e.g . cold , solar , heat urticaria ) , cholinergic urticaria , contact urticaria ) ] Hypersensitivity antihistamine ingredient study drug
